abstract: A few minor accidents and technical incidents affected Friday's warm-up to the Indian Grand Prix.
snippet: A few minor accidents and technical incidents affected Friday's warm-up to the Indian Grand Prix.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI -- Walking through the crowded, chaotic streets of Old Delhi, one is confronted with a thousand distractions - auto rickshaws, motorcylces and cars moving everywhere; fruit vendors, trinket sellers, and all manner of buildings and monuments.

headline.main: Friday's Action Ahead of the Indian Grand Prix
